!upper.tri(synch_arr_sp[,,k], diag = TRUE) == 0, NA, synch_arr_sp[,,k] * !upper.tri(synch_arr_sp[,,k], diag = TRUE)) synch_arr_ts[,,k] <- ifelse(synch_arr_ts[,,k] * !upper.tri(synch_arr_ts[,,k], diag = TRUE) == 0, NA, synch_arr_ts[,,k] * !upper.tri(synch_arr_ts[,,k], diag = TRUE)) } synch_arr_sp_db <- synch_arr_sp synch_arr_ts_db <- synch_arr_ts ``` ::: Create plotting function ::: {.cell} ```{.r
